Articles.Content:
Update: Squad has narrowed down their results and you can now vote OFFICIALLY for a name by going to THIS THREAD. Original post below.

To better see what the community wants as a name for update 0.25, I thought I'd make a poll. Before making it, I gathered some ideas below and put them into a poll. There is no "Other" option in the poll, since I know pretty much everyone would choose it, but if you don't like any of the options, then just don't fill out the poll. Unfortunately, I had to be picky and choose only 10 of the suggestions to keep the poll from being too crazy. Once I get a nice number of responses, I'll post the results here. Below are the options listed in the poll.

  • Big Bang
  • Bigger Booms
  • Fly Safe
  • Hangar Management
  • Master Plane
  • Plane Awesome
  • Plane Destructive
  • Spaceplane Update
  • Strategic Air Kommand
  • Strategic Planes

Here's what the responses ended up looking like.

Edited October 2, 2014 by Andrew Hansen
0.25: The Bomber Update

0.25: The Big Bang update

XD

0.25: The Bomb Squad

or

0.25: The not so Indestructible Space Center
I like the Big Bang update.. but since I am a peon in forum status (Really?).. I can not vote
0.25: Collateral Damage Edition

Office Space!

Administering Space.

Edited October 1, 2014 by Unabled
0.26 - Dropping Da Bomb
I am quite conventional and I would just call .25 the "spaceplane update"

I couldn't settle on one for the real survey, so what do you guys think about these:

HypePlane!

Ballistic Trajectories

Pyrodynamics

Operational Costs

Kerbals on a Plane

Well, it looks like we can submit names for .25 (the link is in this week's dev note). Unfortunately, surveymonkey doesn't let you look at other peoples submissions, so I'm curious to see what people have come up with. (Following ".24 First Contract" is not looking too easy, the best I could come up with so far is ".25 Bigger Booms" ).
0.25: the 'Mortimer is in way over his head' edition
haven't submitted anything yet, but I think I might suggest the "plane awesome" edition

.25 Bits And Pieces

just my idea
How about- "KSP 0.25: Breaking Buildings"?
KSP 0.25: Breaking Jeb
0.25: It was inevitabl... Whoops, wrong game.
I'm guessing the name will revolve around the new Strategies feature.
I'm still for "Snacks on a Plane"
What's the main feature of 0.25? 0.24 was all about contracts so "First Contract" worked well. Now I just can't figure out. Spaceplanes? Strategies? UI facelifting?
0.25 Boom Edition!
0.25 pwedy boom boom

On a wing and a booster.

Though that only hits the spaceplane bit.

I know it's not mine, I know they can't use a youtuber's signature phrase. I know it's impossible, and I'm sad about it. But koddamit, "Fly safe" is too good to pass up! Perhaps Mr. Manley has earned the honour?

Rune. Referencing SP+ and destructible buildings both!

My suggestions from the devnotes thread:

Plane 9 From Outer Space

It's Only Rocket Strategy

Paper Plane Pushing Plus

I Love It When A Plane Comes Together

The Nessie Edition (Nessie feature still unconfirmed, Squad please comment.)

or

Strategic Air Kommand (My favorite, refers to strategies, aircraft, and historically SAC was full of bombers built to blow up buildings)
